dangerZoneSection.pauseSyncer:
**Functional Purpose**: Heading and button text for the 'Pause Syncer' section.
**UI Location**: GitHub Syncer Settings → Connected Section → Danger Zone (section heading and button)
**When Users See This**: When the GitHub Syncer is active and the user is viewing the Danger Zone section.
**Technical Context**: Appears twice for the heading and the button label.
**Current English**: "Pause Syncer"
dangerZoneSection.wantToPause:
**Functional Purpose**: Informative text explaining the purpose of pausing the syncer.
**UI Location**: GitHub Syncer Settings → Connected Section → Danger Zone (paragraph under 'Pause Syncer')
**When Users See This**: When the GitHub Syncer is active and the user is viewing the Danger Zone section.
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting.
**Current English**: "Want to pause your syncer for a while?"
dangerZoneSection.useButtonBelow:
**Functional Purpose**: Instruction to use the button for pausing the syncer.
**UI Location**: GitHub Syncer Settings → Connected Section → Danger Zone (paragraph under 'Pause Syncer')
**When Users See This**: When the GitHub Syncer is active and the user is viewing the Danger Zone section.
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting.
**Current English**: "Use the button below. You can restart it at any time."
dangerZoneSection.disconnectSyncer:
**Functional Purpose**: Heading for the 'Disconnect Syncer' section.
**UI Location**: GitHub Syncer Settings → Connected Section → Danger Zone (section heading)
**When Users See This**: When the user is viewing the Danger Zone section, regardless of syncer activity.
**Technical Context**: Also used as the confirm label in the disconnect confirmation modal. Appears twice.
**Current English**: "Disconnect Syncer"
dangerZoneSection.wantToDisconnect:
**Functional Purpose**: Informative text explaining the purpose of disconnecting the syncer.
**UI Location**: GitHub Syncer Settings → Connected Section → Danger Zone (paragraph under 'Disconnect Syncer')
**When Users See This**: When the user is viewing the Danger Zone section.
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting.
**Current English**: "Want to disconnect the syncer from your GitHub repository? Use the button below."
dangerZoneSection.noteWillDeleteSettings: **Functional Purpose**: Important note warning users about data loss upon disconnection. **UI Location**: GitHub Syncer Settings → Connected Section → Danger Zone (paragraph under 'Disconnect Syncer') **When Users See This**: When the user is viewing the Danger Zone section. **Technical Context**: Rendered with `dangerouslySetInnerHTML` and contains a `` tag, which must remain unchanged. **Current English**: "Note: This will also delete all settings on this page, so please manually save any settings you might wish to reuse in the future (e.g. your path template)."
dangerZoneSection.disconnectGithub:
**Functional Purpose**: Button text to initiate the disconnection process.
**UI Location**: GitHub Syncer Settings → Connected Section → Danger Zone (button)
**When Users See This**: When the user is viewing the Danger Zone section.
**Technical Context**: Standard button text.
**Current English**: "Disconnect GitHub"
dangerZoneSection.areYouSureDisconnect:
**Functional Purpose**: Title for the confirmation modal when disconnecting the GitHub repository.
**UI Location**: GitHub Syncer Settings → Confirmation Modal (title)
**When Users See This**: When the user clicks the 'Disconnect GitHub' button.
**Technical Context**: Standard modal title.
**Current English**: "Are you sure you want to disconnect your GitHub repository?"
dangerZoneSection.thisActionCannotUndone:
**Functional Purpose**: Description text for the confirmation modal when disconnecting the GitHub repository.
**UI Location**: GitHub Syncer Settings → Confirmation Modal (description)
**When Users See This**: When the user clicks the 'Disconnect GitHub' button.
**Technical Context**: Standard modal description.
**Current English**: "This action cannot be undone."
dangerZoneSection.disconnectSyncerConfir:
**Functional Purpose**: Confirmation button label for the 'Disconnect Syncer' modal.
**UI Location**: GitHub Syncer Settings → Confirmation Modal (confirm button label)
**When Users See This**: When the user clicks the 'Disconnect GitHub' button and the modal appears.
**Technical Context**: This is the action button label within the confirmation modal.
**Current English**: "Disconnect Syncer"
dangerZoneSection.cancel:
**Functional Purpose**: Label for the decline/cancel button in the confirmation modal.
**UI Location**: GitHub Syncer Settings → Confirmation Modal (decline button label)
**When Users See This**: When a confirmation modal is open, either for pausing or disconnecting.
**Technical Context**: Used in multiple confirmation modals. Generic cancel label.
**Current English**: "Cancel"
